channel.title: Teleport Command?
channel.description:
Hey ppl i was wondering if anyone could help me make a command for teleporting to a place.... and wat file would i go to, to change where u are being teleported to... plz help :D
-Pure Jukes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2008, 08:48:36 PM[/size][hr]cmon ppl some1's gotta know

item.title: Teleport Command?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("COMMAND HERE")) { if (!teleblock) { teleportToX = XXXX; // X Coord teleportToY = YYYY; // Y Coord sendMessage("Teleporting you to this place.......") } else if (teleblock) { sendMessage("You are teleblocked and cannot teleport!."); } }

These codes are posted in client.java by the other command codes. This code will most likely not work for you because my server is a lot different that regular servers and is coded differently… Just fix the minor adjustments and your done.

Read full topic
